        public static java.lang.String authorizeUrl​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> params,
                                            RequestOptions options)
                                     throws AuthenticationException,
                                            InvalidRequestException
        Generates a URL to Stripe's OAuth form.
        Parameters:
        params - the parameters to include in the URL.
        options - the request options.
        Returns:
        the URL to Stripe's OAuth form.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException
        InvalidRequestException

      • token

        public static TokenResponse token​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> params,
                                  RequestOptions options)
                           throws StripeException
        Uses an authorization code to connect an account to your platform and fetch the user's credentials.
        Parameters:
        params - the request parameters.
        options - the request options.
        Returns:
        the TokenResponse instance containing the response from the OAuth API.
        Throws:
        StripeException

                                       throws StripeException
        Disconnects an account from your platform.
        Parameters:
        params - the request parameters.
        options - the request options.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        StripeException
